text: Donald McCarthy, CBE (19 June 1955 - 21 July 2018) was a British entrepreneur and philanthropist. He was known for being the chairman of House of Fraser from 2006 to 2014. From 2007 until 2012 McCarthy also was chairman of Aurum, a British watch and jewellery retailer. McCarthy was appointed Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) in the 2017 New Year Honours for services to business and philanthropy. McCarthy died on 21 July 2018 from cancer in London at the age of 63.Don McCarthy, Former House of Fraser Chairman, Dies at 63 ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:British philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from London
title: Don McCarthy
